Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.server

Class Server

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.server.Server
public class Server extends Object
server class, manages all the matches

    Method
    Description
    void
    createLobby(CreateLobbyMessage settings, Connection connection)
    creates a lobby with specific settings and add it to waiting lobbies list
    void
    deregisterConnection(Connection connection)
    removes a connection from the list of active connections; it also manages the cases when the player to remove is in a waiting lobby, is the host of a lobby and is in a playing lobby

    getNumOfConnections()
    gets the number of active connections on the server

    setLobbyTeam(ChooseTeamMessage message, Connection connection)
    sets the teams for a lobby (4 players match)
    boolean
    validUsername(String username, Connection connection)

    • Server

      public Server(int port) throws IOException
      builds a server class
      Parameters:
      port - server port on listening
      Throws:
      IOException - if there are IO problems

  • Method Details

    • deregisterConnection

      public void deregisterConnection(Connection connection)
      removes a connection from the list of active connections; it also manages the cases when the player to remove is in a waiting lobby, is the host of a lobby and is in a playing lobby
      Parameters:
      connection - connection to remove

    • joinLobby

      public void joinLobby(String host, Connection connection)
      makes a player join a lobby
      Parameters:
      host - host of the lobby to join
      connection - connection of the player who wants to join

    • run

      public void run()
      starts the main process on the server (called in ServerApp)

    • validUsername

      public boolean validUsername(String username, Connection connection)
      checks if a username is valid (is unique) and, in that case, adds it to clients list
      Parameters:
      username - username
      connection - connection of the player
      Returns:
      validity of username

    • createLobby

      public void createLobby(CreateLobbyMessage settings, Connection connection)
      creates a lobby with specific settings and add it to waiting lobbies list
      Parameters:
      settings - lobby settings
      connection - connection of the player who creates the lobby

    • setLobbyTeam

      public void setLobbyTeam(ChooseTeamMessage message, Connection connection)
      sets the teams for a lobby (4 players match)
      Parameters:
      message - choose team message
      connection - connection of the player who has chosen the team

    • getWaitingLobbies

      public List<Lobby> getWaitingLobbies()
      gets the waiting lobbies
      Returns:
      waiting lobbies

    • getNumOfConnections

      public int getNumOfConnections()
      gets the number of active connections on the server
      Returns:
      number of connections
